JobTitle: Digital Technology Principal Specialist or Manager - Cloud Operations Supervisor
JobFullDesc: At Raytheon Missiles & Defense, fresh thinking and possibilities are forged in times of change and you will be on the front lines as we trailblaze new approaches, push the boundaries of innovation and chart a course to a tomorrow you can be proud to have a hand in creating. Our Digital Technology (DT) Team is global in every sense of the word. Across the world, DT allows RMD employees to communicate, collaborate and innovate for customer success. And we never stand still, either. We’re continuously pushing the envelope to create leading-edge technical processing solutions for complex systems and program challenges The RMD DT Digital Business Infrastructure (DBI) team delivers shared infrastructure solutions and services to enable the transformation of the RMD business. These capabilities include Enterprise Common Classified networks, as well as on premise, hybrid, and commercial cloud & DevOps infrastructure development, deployment, and sustainment. Additionally, the DBI team enables business transformation through factory / operational technology service integration and modernization and Engineering lab standardization and cyber hardening. Job Summary:We are seeking a hands-on Cloud Operations Supervisor to work closely with the team on information technology tactics and strategies. The Program Resource Center (PRC) is an IT resource center that hosts multiple programs and initiatives on a shared server and storage infrastructure managed by Raytheon employees. It has a variety of hosting options, specializing in quick stand-up of services. It is specifically tasked with the support of programs in their early life cycle, IRADs, strategic initiatives, and specialized IT environments. Reporting to the Manager III, Hybrid and Commercial Cloud, the position will have the opportunity to be involved in projects across the organization and have immediate influence on the operations of the Program Resource Center and expansion. As a Cloud Operations Supervisor in our Program Resource Center (PRC) team you’ll be part of a highly skilled group, delivering cutting edge IT/DT solutions, while supporting a prestigious hosting service.  Responsibilities to Anticipate:  Ownership of an advanced hyper-converged datacenter supporting over 700+ servers and over 40+ RMD programs.Supervision of security configuration management and operational integrity for 100+ Sys Admins who manage servers within the PRC – Program Resource CenterManagement of large specialized environments supporting Data Analytics and Enterprise Classified Networking that have custom hosting arrangements with the PRC – Program Resource CenterOversee an AOP of over $2M a year including facilities upgrades, lease refresh, capacity planning, and expansion planningOversee IT services, escalate issues to internal IT management as appropriate, provide feedback and identify opportunities for improvement, and partner with the technical staff to implement improvementsManage 17+ external cloud environments hosted by Amazon including security and financial trackingLead a wide variety of IT projects and strategy executions, including the design and deployment of new IT systems and servicesProvide hands-on support to employees on a wide variety of day-to-day issues.Contribute to the design, configuration, deployment, enhancement, maintenance, and support of the department’s infrastructure.Maintain system documentation and configuration data for operating, regulatory, and security audit purposes.Participate in a variety of IT special projects and other duties, as assignedWork with internal customers on research and development leads using the latest in technology.Research new infrastructure technology trends, assessing their utility deployment within the Program Resource Center or Cloud. Assist in managing public cloud resources, including administration of cloud costs and utilization.Manage and report on support metrics through security and ticketing systems.
